name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Sliced avocado on whole-grain toast topped with poached eggs.

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of bread soaked in a sweetened egg mixture, grilled to perfection.

name: Egg and Cheese Bagel
description: Toasted bagel with scrambled eggs and melted cheese.

name: Vegetarian Omelette
description: A fluffy omelette filled with assorted vegetables.

name: Blueberry Muffins
description: Moist and delicious muffins bursting with blueberries.

description: Layers of granola, yogurt, and fresh fruit for a healthy start.

name: Bacon and Egg Sandwich
description: Toasted bread with crispy bacon, fried egg, and a touch of mayo.

name: Belgian Waffles
description: Light and fluffy waffles served with whipped cream and strawberries.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: A hearty burrito filled with eggs, sausage, cheese, and salsa.

description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken, mixed greens, and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

name: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
description: Quinoa bowl with assorted vegetables and a zesty lemon tahini dressing.

description: Grilled BBQ chicken, lettuce, and ranch dressing in a wrap.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy mushroom risotto with Parmesan cheese and fresh herbs.

description: Grilled salmon fillet with a zesty lemon dill sauce, served with roasted vegetables.

description: Butter-poached lobster tail served with drawn butter and lemon.
